register.title: Create your account
register.pleaseVerifyEmail: Please check your email to verify your account.
register.passwordHelper: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters.
register.failed: Failed to create account. Please try again.
register.logoutError: Error logging out after registration. Please try again later.

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.verifyEmailDescription: Please check your inbox and verify your email address before logging in.

emailVerification.successDescription: You can now log in to your account.
emailVerification.failureDescription: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please try again or request a new verification email.
emailVerification.verificationInfoDescription: Please check your email for the verification link.
emailVerification.resendSuccessDescription: Please check your inbox for the new verification email.
emailVerification.resendErrorDescription: Please try again later or contact support.
emailVerification.rateLimitError: Please wait before requesting another email
emailVerification.enterEmailPrompt: Enter your email address to receive a new verification link:
emailVerification.alreadyVerifiedDescription: Your email has already been verified. You can log in now.
